kizuna_battle_c_health_01: No way. No way! NO WAY![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_battle_c_03: Nurse Miriam here won’t try the sandwich I made![VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_c_health_02: Well, DUH! I don’t want to get a stomachache![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_battle_c_health_03:
Uh, I still remember that “sandwich” you made
me with meat filling and meat for bread.\r
That one really messed me up bad.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_battle_c_05:
I hadn’t trained in the art of sandwich making yet
back then! I was young and thoughtless and—[VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_c_health_04: “Young and thoughtless”? It was LAST MONTH![VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_battle_c_06:
Sooo, as you can see, I’m not getting anywhere
trying to persuade her.[VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_c_07:
Even after I went through that intensive sandwich-
making training! It kinda makes me sad...[VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_c_health_05:
She went through intensive sandwich-making
training?[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_battle_c_select_03: She worked really hard at it!
kizuna_battle_c_health_07:
I guess I have no choice if you’ve got one of our
cute little students on your side.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_battle_c_health_08: So, fine. I’ll try your sandwich. Let’s see it.[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_battle_c_08: Yesss! I knew you’d come around. Here it is...[VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_c_health_10:
It’s a little strongly flavored, but...I guess it’s
not bad?[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_battle_c_10:
I’m so glad my sandwich pleases the great
Nurse Miriam! I look up to you, you know![VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_c_system_01: You feel trusted by Ms. Dendra!
kizuna_battle_c_11:
Thank you for trying it! And thanks to you too,
new kid![VAR 0114(0024)]
kizuna_battle_c_health_11: Aaand she’s run off again. That was weird...[VAR 0114(0028)]
kizuna_battle_c_health_12:
But that’s just how Ms. Dendra is, I guess. She’s
always coming into the nurse’s office with some\r
injury or another, too.[VAR 0114(0028)]
